summary: a script for running wc nicely
name: vimwc.sh
description: I use this script mapped to <F12>. It outputs the current wordcount to the \\&#039status bar\\&#039 thus aleviating the ever annoying \\&#039Press enter\\&#039 prompt after using :!
install_details:
Put vimwc.sh somewhere in your PATH
Edit vimwc.sh for your configuration (use mktemp or PID)
Add something along the lines of 
    map <F8> :so `vimwc.sh %`<CR>
